google_play_reviews.content: kDrive app is nicely designed. Very detailed information and stable updates. Different types of productivity apps , files documents, Collabra office , photos and many more for the Shared multi media platform.

For backing up photos, it seems to work great; however I am unable to edit files from my android. I try editing an excel file - used 4 different spreadsheet apps - and it either doesn't save or it says the file is read only.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lance, can you please contact our support so that we can reproduce the problem and correct it if necessary? It is easy to contact us by chat, email or phone at support.infomaniak.com Thank you for your time.

google_play_reviews.content: Good app, works well. I however really miss 2 functionalities: 1) the ability to automaticalky backup files that are not photos or videos 2) the possibility of creating photo albums with the photos that are in the gallery
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you very much for your suggestions and your feedback which have been well transmitted to our team.

google_play_reviews.content: I was fixing to blast the app coz ya don't mention HERE that's its NOT available to privacy savvy Americans. But it actually does say so on the site for the free email. I was so excited, yet denied. But looking forward to and hoping for availability to USA. Looks extremely promising as long as it doesn't get too bloated. Will revise rating if/when becomes available. At any rate thanks for putting stuff like this out for people.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mike, you should have no problem using kDrive if you are in the US. Please contact us at support.infomaniak.com if you have any problems.

google_play_reviews.content: Overall a really great and easy to use app. I've been using kDrive for a year now and the app works great! The only downside the app has for me is the lack of being able to offline sync folders. Currently if you want to sync a folder, you'd have to set each file inside of it to offline sync, taking a long time. But else it's great for sharing files!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Bonjour Joel merci beaucoup pour votre retour qui est déjà dans la liste des fonctionnalités que nous discutons pour l'évolution de l'application. Bonne fin de semaine à vous et merci d'avoir pris le temps de nous faire part de votre expérience.

google_play_reviews.content: Infomaniak seems to be a great initiative, well done ! Only I can't manage to edit files on this app...

There's a lot to like here with some limitations. This great to browse and download files from your kDrive. But it's limited with editing files and offline sync. I have a big folder full of plain text files I use as notes. While I can store them for offline use, I'd have to select that option for every single file. You can't select a folder for offline. Also, I saw no way to edit a simple text file so the changes sync to kDrive.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your feedback which has been forwarded to the kDrive team.

google_play_reviews.content: You should really make clear in your description that the free offerings are only for customers in certain countries. You are misleading as your description currently stands.

very good app, i have 2 problems though.. device info: samsung galaxy a52s running android 12 & latest kdrive 1. "available offline" shouldn't be added to gallery imo, if i wanted a picture in my gallery, i'd download it. 2. when i try to play a video the app gives me the error "Video file not supported by the video player" other than that, very solid app. :)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Bonjour, le point 1 a été remonté auprès de nos équipes. Concernant le point 2, nous aurions besoin de plus de détails afin d'analyser le problème. Pourriez-vous svp. contacter notre support par e-mail, chat ou téléphone depuis la page support.infomaniak.com ? Merci
